item.description: Come to Gail Fuller's cozy home in Bristol for a fantastic holiday party!  Dress to impress, optional $10 grab bag gift, and BYOB.  Bring either an appetizer or dessert to share.  Dues paying Members $5, Guests $10.  To reserve, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 35 Anthony Drive:  I‑84 Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), then Exit 1 (Rt. 177), right onto North Washington St., at 2nd light left onto Northwest Dr., at end right onto Camp Street, left onto O'Sullivan Drive, at end turn right to stop, left onto Brace Ave., left onto Anthony Drive.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Holiday House Party
